name: Fading Away (Sleepy1Cloud)
description:
Fading Away is a platformer where you play as a ghost struggling to keep existing. The longer you stay outside objects the more you will fade. Stay too long and you will fade completely.

Submission for GameDev.tv Jam 2022 under the theme "Death is Only The Beginning"

Controls:

A and D  -  Move Left and Right
Space bar - Jump
E - Enter/Leave Object

via GIPHY

Credit:

Solo project by Nick Walters
